name: Gardner
message: Wait... Jonathan...

name: Gardner
message: Where is this？
Isn't this a graveyard? What are you trying to do here?

name: Jonathan
message: It all started at that monastery.
Those awful experiments that were being done in that basement...

name: Gardner
message: I get that loud and clear.
But, why do we have to come to a graveyard anyway？

name: Gardner
message: If we have time to waste in a place like this, shouldn't we find Thomas, who's probably somewhere in the village trying to summon that accursed god, and stop him first？

name: Jonathan
message: I might not even have the right to do something like that, you know, I...

name: Gardner
message: 君が何だと言うんだ。

name: Jonathan
message: If I belong to the same blood as Dollie, then my very existence is extremely dangerous.

name: Gardner
message: What the hell are you saying...?

name: Jonathan
message: I might be someone connected to the 'Covenant-Bearers', just like Dollie.

name: Gardner
message: Are you saying you want to check that here？

name: Jonathan
message: We're going to dig up the Dunwich family grave.
Check what's over there.

name: Gardner
message: Got it... I'll help too.

name: Gardner
message: No way... I can't believe I'd do something like this...

name: Gardner
message: Can't believe I gotta end up digging up a dead guy's grave...

name: Jonathan
message: What are you talking about? Your job is pretty much the same as a grave robber, isn't it?

name: Gardner
message: Well, that's true, but...
Gardner is breathing heavily, moving the shovel.
If you’re digging up an ancient tomb, sure, you might’ve done it before, but it’s a whole different story when it’s a grave of someone buried only a few decades ago.

name: Jonathan
message: It’s okay, if my guess is right, the thing buried in here is‥‥‥‥‥
My shovel hit something hard with a loud clunk.
Must be the lid of the coffin.

name: Gardner
message: Is it out?！

name: Jonathan
message: On the plate of the coffin......
It says Hannah Dunwich.

name: Gardner
message: That's the name of Dollie's second daughter.
She's the younger sister of Lorina, the girl who was said to have gotten sick in the diary.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's... open the lid.

name: Gardner
message: W-wait a sec, let me get ready for this...

name: Gardner
message: It's just that I'm not used to seeing such raw corpses face to face.

name: Jonathan
message: Ready？

name: Jonathan
message: I'm opening it.

name: Gardner
message: O-okay...... go ahead.

name: Gardner
message: This is......

name: Gardner
message: What on earth is this？

name: Jonathan
message: Just as I thought......

name: Gardner
message: What do you mean, 'just as you thought'？
Is this really the corpse of a girl?

name: Jonathan
message: Dollie's daughter wasn't dead！

name: Gardner
message: What's going on here?
Yeah, during the autopsy for sure......

name: Jonathan
message: I came back to life.
Sure enough, after being killed by Dollie's hand, I came back to life while transforming into a Deep One.

name: Gardner
message: Something like that...

name: Gardner
message: So then, Dollie's other daughter as well...
So this is what being sick means.

name: Jonathan
message: ドルリイはこうなる事が解っていて、それで自分の家　　　　　　　　族を全て殺したんだ。

name: Gardner
message: What a terrifying thing......

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah... This isn’t the first time I’ve seen this.　　　　　　　　I’ve seen something like this before.

name: Jonathan
message: That is...
That was back when I was still a kid.
At my mansion in Wales......
My mother was a sickly person.
I had no way of knowing what illness it was, since I was just a kid, but my mother was shut away alone in the attic room, and I was forbidden from going near that room.
Up until then, I had never seen my mother with my own eyes.
And the adults around me avoided talking about my mother.
I remember that they treated me like I was something dangerous to touch.
And then, I saw it.
I think it was the kind of innocent curiosity kids usually have.
I snuck into the attic, where I wasn't allowed to go near, and slipped into my mother's bedroom while she was asleep.
What did you see there...
For some reason, it feels like I've been avoiding thinking about that until now.
私はそこで何をみたのだろう‥‥‥‥‥
Even now at this age, I can never forget it, and yet it's something I don't allow myself to remember...
あれは‥‥‥‥
Yeah......
そうだ、棺の中の少女と同じ‥‥‥
Mom was trying to transform into a Deep One！

name: Gardner
message: What's up, Josanan?

name: Jonathan
message: I knew it after all........

name: Jonathan
message: Me too...just like Dollie...

name: Gardner
message: What are you talking about！
This is no time to space out in a place like this.

name: Gardner
message: Are you just going to abandon Cordelia like this？
She's waiting for your help, you know.

name: Jonathan
message: But... I...

name: Jonathan
message: I'm just like Dollie and this girl, you know？
I　might　end　up　like　Mom　someday,　you　know.

name: Nai
message: That's right.

name: Gardner
message: You... what are you doing here！

name: Nai
message: That's a stupid question.
I've　always　been　by　Jonathan's　side.

name: Jonathan
message: I... is that how it is？
Dollie and I are the same kind of human, huh.

name: Nai
message: That's right, exactly.
Didn't you say you came to Arkham looking for a certain woman？

name: Nai
message: What's that woman's name？

name: Jonathan
message: ......Sarah.

name: Nai
message: That's the name of the girl who set fire to the monastery in your dream, right?

name: Gardner
message: But... Even if Sarah was alive, and she really was Jonathan's ancestor, that still doesn't mean he's destined to turn into a Deep One！

name: Gardner
message: No matter what happened to Sarah at the monastery, she was still just a little girl.

name: Nai
message: But that wasn't the case.
Sarah is pregnant with Pietro—no, Philip Dunwich's child.

name: Nai
message: Philip, the 'covenant-holder's' kid, huh.
I’ve been waiting for Jonathan to come for a whole 100 years.

name: Nai
message: Dollie, Philip's biological child, went against my offer and killed herself and her child.

name: Nai
message: It looked like the bloodline of the 'Pactmakers' had died out...
That wasn't the case.

name: Gardner
message: So Jonathan is the last survivor, huh...

name: Nai
message: Covenant Jonathan Swift, now is the time.
Now that that idiot has caused trouble, this is the only time we can wake up our leader from their slumber.

name: Gardner
message: Stop it, Jonathan. You can still make it in time if you quit now.
Let's　rescue　Cordelia　and　get　out　of　this　village！

name: Nai
message: Someday, you'll turn into a hideous thing, just like that girl in the coffin, or your own mother.

name: Nai
message: その時を恐れて、これから一生怯えながら暮らすのか？
I think it's smarter to plunge this world into fear and chaos with my leader, and reign as king.

name: Jonathan
message: For me... deciding something like that...

name: Voice
message: No, you’re the one who decides.

name: Jonathan
message: And you？

name: Voice
message: Jonathan Swift. I am you.
This is your true self, the one you've desperately tried to suppress.

name: Jonathan
message: ......No way！

name: Voice
message: You... I've been scared this whole time.
I wonder if I'll end up like my mom someday.

name: Voice
message: The truth is, you actually wanted it to end up like this.
A　hideous,　greedy,　evil-filled　monster...
Because that was your true self！

name: Jonathan
message: No way... I have no idea what you're talking about.

name: Voice
message: The reason you were shown dreams wasn't just to make you remember what happened.

name: Voice
message: It's to awaken your true desires！

name: Jonathan
message: True desires？ What are you talking about...

name: Voice
message: You were jealous...of Philip Dunwich.
That man who could do whatever he wanted with the bodies of women, chained up and crying out...

name: Jonathan
message: Why did I... to such an evil man！

name: Voice
message: That evil blood flows through you.
You're a human just like Philip.

name: Jonathan
message: 違う！

name: Voice
message: You can't lie to yourself, Jonathan. You were aroused.　　　　　 By the filthy bodies of women violated and writhing in ecstasy by those abominable creatures　　　... And by the sight of Sarah, crying and screaming！

name: Jonathan
message: Shut up...... I... What you're saying is bullshit！

name: Voice
message: You should know what it is you really want.

name: Voice
message: Just like you wanted... The sacrifice is ready too.

name: Nai
message: Jonathan, shoot this guy dead.
And then, come with me.

name: Voice
message: Alright, let's go. They're waiting for me to come.
You have to fulfill the pact.

name: Gardner
message: Stop it, Jonathan......
Get a grip, everything this guy says is a lie.

name: Nai
message: Kneel with me before the lord and swear eternal loyalty！
Hurry up and shoot this man dead.

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan！

name: Gardner
message: Jonathan......

name: Jonathan
message: You've gotta be kidding me......

name: Jonathan
message: No way I'm gonna let bastards like this mess with me.
I'm not a puppet！

name: Gardner
message: That's how it should be.

name: Jonathan
message: Professor...

name: Gardner
message: Let's hurry, we have to save Cordelia.
Besides, if I don't stop that idiot, things are gonna get real bad.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's go.

name: Gardner
message: Do you know where the two of them are？

name: Jonathan
message: It's the basement of the Dunwich Mansion, it's the only place left.

name: Gardner
message: That secret passage leading underground, huh.
フィリップ・ダニッジがこの日のために造っておいた　　　　　　　　のだな。

name: Jonathan
message: Let's go, if we don't hurry...

name: Nai
message: That's exactly what makes you worthy of being the last descendant of the covenant.

name: Jonathan
message: What should we do now?

name: Nai
message: I have to go to my lord right away.
Before that wretched fool makes a mistake.

name: Jonathan
message: Thomas...

name: Nai
message: That's right, even if we have the Necronomicon, unless there are covenant-bearers, our lord will not awaken from his slumber.

name: Nai
message: But with so many villagers already awakened, we can't just stop the ritual halfway.

name: Jonathan
message: So you mean you can't afford to waste the 'offerings'.

name: Nai
message: It means what Philip Dunwich did ended up working out in an unexpected way.

name: Jonathan
message: You've been alive ever since the time when Philip was still around, huh？

name: Nai
message: Why do you think I'm called 'the last one left'？
Until the time when my lord awakens from his slumber, I can't even die.

name: Jonathan
message: The letter that was in the laboratory at Dunwich Mansion...

name: Nai
message: That was someone who shared the same ideals as Philip.
He's one of the founders of the organization that Thomas, who's causing us trouble right now, belongs to.

name: Jonathan
message: How ironic.

name: Nai
message: You can get lost in your feelings later, right now you have to do what needs to be done.

name: Jonathan
message: Where are you going？

name: Nai
message: There's a path from the basement of the Dunwich Mansion that leads to that place.
Let's go to the ritual site Philip made.
